title: My game wont let me in
body: So when i clicked on the League of legends icon (the newer version) it started to load to long and it happend many times  so i uninstalled lol and reinstalled and so when i click on the logo The old one legacy  it says do you want to update i then  click yes but it still wont let me update it to the newer version i accept the application but it does nothing so when i click Launch it turns gray then back to orange like i never clicked it PLease help i want to play lol

replies.body: If nothing is happening when you hit Launch then there may be a setting blocking the client from opening.  Go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore permissions on your computer and allow the client to launch.  Let me know if you have any questions!
